    • Method Detail

      • addClient

        public void addClient(java.lang.String id,
             java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String lastName,
             ClientAccount.Rank rank)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      ClientIdAlreadyExistsException
        Add client method. create client object and put it in bank clients hashMap, write to log file client object has created.
        Parameters:
        id - client id.
        name - client first name.
        lastName - client last name.
        rank - client account rank.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case I/O log file failure.
        ClientIdAlreadyExistsException - in case client id already exists in the bank hashMap.

      • removeClient

        public void removeClient(java.lang.String id)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         ClientIsNotExistsException
        Remove client method. remove client from bank hashMap by his id, write to log file client object has removed.
        Parameters:
        id - client id.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case I/O log file failure.
        ClientIsNotExistsException - in case client id is not exists in the bank hashMap.

      • depositCommissionAccount

        public void depositCommissionAccount(double amount,
                            Operation.Description description)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     NotEnoughBalanceException
        Implements bank accounts interface method, deposit into commission bank account, used in client account, to hide other bank information and methods from client account class.
        Specified by:
        depositCommissionAccount in interface BankAccountsInterface
        Parameters:
        amount - the money amount to deposit.
        description - deposit type cash or check or commission or iterest.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case I/O log file failure.
        NotEnoughBalanceException - not relevant in account class.

      • saveAndCloseBeforeExit

        public void saveAndCloseBeforeExit()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Save data and close open files before exit, stop account updater thread, close log file, call save method, exit system value 0, write to log file the operation details.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException in case I/O bank data or log file failure.

      • save

        public void save()
          throws java.io.IOException
        open bank data file and write cach data into file, save method used serialization mechanism.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case I/O bank data file failure.
